attributes.review: Now don’t get me wrong I love Trump but this app is bad just bad. I hate getting text messages from campaigns (like I have no money please stop asking) and the first this he wants is my number?! B It’s like he’s so great in office and then this app is not! I don’t want him to run his next few years in the White House like this app!! I may reconsider my vote after this app....
attributes.title: NOT A LIBTARD

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and then immediately a large orange came knocking at my door which was the weirdest thing and then I turned on the tv and all the people had turned into oranges and then a bunch of mermaids entered my pool and started singing I’m no ordinary girl and then suddenly a swarm of fairies entered my house and told me that this app was amazing💕🧚‍♀️😊 at wasting your time🥰🌺☀️💗🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Fairy Invasion

attributes.review: Worst app ever. I downloaded because someone recommended and said that the content was funny and had jokes. But I wasn’t this prepared I mean what’s more funnier  then a man that’s racist and a rapist be the president of a country. I almost die of a laughter next time they should put a warning or something cause one day someone is going to die of laughter. U guys are risking people’s lifes.😤

This app is absolutely garbage. As soon as I downloaded this app it made my phone go hay-wire. My screen went black and would flash white for hours. Then it quit working, I couldn’t turn my phone on for TWO days!!!! What the F—k??? Finally I when I was able to turn it back on all my information was lost. Like what the hell??
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: Worst app ever. It doesn’t even work! As soon as I opened it my phone started glitching like I had an Samsung, it was ridiculous. Not to mention, it took up a bunch of my storage. I couldn’t take a single photo after downloading this app. This app is pretty worthless & should be deleted immediately!
attributes.title: This app is atrocious.

attributes.review: This app broke my phone iPad cost me a lot of money no one wants to be responsible of the damage plusAfter four years I patiently wait for all hi promises and didn’t deliver, why wait 4 more , let’s try again he isn’t suit for this, talking nonsense, this is starting to look a lot like a dictator, Americans are supposed to be free, nope, he didn’t delivered,
attributes.title: Didn’t deliver

attributes.review: I didn’t know this app existed, but sadly when I downloaded it it took too long. There’s a fair amount of bug fixes that should be addressed. I do not recommend the downloading of this app. You can just get all of Trumps updates other ways a lot easier. Just takes up storage and unnecessary.
attributes.title: Sad.

attributes.review: This app is terrible!!! I wanted to see what was all about this app. Right when i opened it I ALMOST THREW UP!!! I saw a picture of a disgusting looking racist child predator type man!! Ugh looked HORRIBLE still wondering if he had his glow-up yet! Don’t download the app!!! He said " MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN" MAN YOU HAD FOUR YEARS TO DO THAT AND ALL YOU’VE DONE IS MAKE IT WORSE!!! 😡😡😡 If you support this annoying orange UGH!!! DIE DIE DIE
attributes.title: Terrible app.

attributes.review: app kept sending me push notifications prompting me to select y/n for an “all expenses paid vacation” on the private island of a close trump associate... i think his last name started with an E? Maybe Ep something? either way not worth the download, those push notifications were so annoying!
attributes.title: questionable

attributes.review:
For some reason whenever I try to click anything from the menu, the app completely shuts down. I’ve tried to restart my phone and reinstall the app but I literally can’t click on anything 🤬 

This can’t possibly be an official app. What a broken piece of garbage.
attributes.title: Unusable - must be fake
